name: Rolling Maze (itch)
description:
You play as Dice Boy (a literal dice), to escape a maze. On the way there are obstacles you can roll under, but every time you roll you randomly get a new ability. Use these abilities to navigate your way out of the maze.

If you roll:

1 - minus roll attempt

2 or 3 - opens doors

4 - 2x zoom out view of the maze

5 - plus roll attempt

6 - 4x zoom out view of the maze

Controls:

press Z - roll

press X - use ability

hold C - ability guide pop-up

hold I - instruction pop-up

(Known issues due to time constraint and lack of beta testing:

Sometimes the player can't pass through openings because of unoptimized collision detection and space. Or touch the winning flag through the walls instead of solving the maze.)
